<h2 id="Vocab">Vocab<a class="anchor-link" href="#Vocab"> </a></h2><ul>
<li>algorithms: set of instructions that can accomplish a specific task</li>
<li>Pseudocode: A blend of human language and coding format.</li>
<li>Strings: A string is a collection of characters. character can be anything from numbers, letters, spaces, </li>
<li>String concatenation: combining 2 or more strings to make a new strings in order to create a new string</li>
<li>Substrings: A substring is a part of and already existing string.</li>
</ul>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">

<h2 id="Mathematical-Expressions-and-Strings">Mathematical Expressions and Strings<a class="anchor-link" href="#Mathematical-Expressions-and-Strings"> </a></h2><ul>
<li>algorithms<ul>
<li>set of instructions that can accomplish a specific task</li>
<li>Arithmetic operations in programming are performed in the same order as operations in mathematics</li>
<li>Three different types<ul>
<li>sequence: Algorithms do tasks in the order of specification</li>
<li>selection: select two diff outcomes based on one decision</li>
<li>iteration: if a certain condition is proved true then a second step will be repeated</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>can be represented in two ways<ul>
<li>Pseudocode: A blend of human language and coding format. </li>
<li>flow charts
<img src="https://github.com/vivianknee/FastPages/blob/master/images/flowchart.png?raw=true" alt="flowchart"></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<ul>
<li>Different way variables are stored<ul>
<li>Numerical value stored in a variable</li>
<li>Value of another variable stored in a variable</li>
<li>Result of an operation stored in a variable</li>
<li>Result of a procedure call stored in a variable</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">score</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>   <span class="c1"># 1</span>
<span class="n">score</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">newScore</span>    <span class="c1"># 2</span>
<span class="n">score</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">newScore</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">2</span>    <span class="c1"># 3</span>
<span class="n">avgScore</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">allscores</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">60</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">80</span><span class="p">)</span>    <span class="c1"># 4</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<ul>
<li>Strings<ul>
<li>A string is a collection of characters. character can be anything from numbers, letters, spaces, special symbols, etc.</li>
<li><code>len()</code> to find the length of a string</li>
<li><code>lower()</code> to convert to lowercase</li>
<li><code>len()</code> returns the length of a string   </li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>String Concatenation<ul>
<li>String concatenation is combining 2 or more strings to make a new strings in order to create a new string</li>
<li><code>concat()</code> returns a string made up of the concatenated strings </li>
<li><code>concat("cookie","monster")</code> returns <code>cookiemonster</code> </li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Substrings<ul>
<li>A substring is a part of and already existing string.</li>
<li><code>substring()</code> returns the characters from the string begining at the first position to the last. Ex: <code>("abcdefghijk", 2, 5)</code> would print bced</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="HW">HW<a class="anchor-link" href="#HW"> </a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">Noun</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Mr.Mortenson&quot;</span> 
<span class="n">Adjective</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;handsome&quot;</span> 
<span class="n">Adjective2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Very&quot;</span> 
<span class="n">Verb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;is&quot;</span> 
<span class="n">abrev</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Noun</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">yoda</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Adjective2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">Adjective</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">abrev</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">Verb</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot;.&quot;</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">yoda</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>

<span class="n">cookie2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;rasin&quot;</span> 
<span class="n">len1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cookie</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="mi">2</span> 
<span class="n">len2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cookie2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">45</span> 
<span class="n">vote1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cookie</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; vote &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">len2</span><span class="p">)</span> 
<span class="n">vote2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cookie2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&quot; vote &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">len1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">votes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">vote1</span> <span class="o">+</span>  <span class="s2">&quot; &quot;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">vote2</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">votes</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
